feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Per-app Language Preferences 1.2
entry.content: Add more hooks to (somehow) improve compatibility

entry.title: Taskbar tray system icon tweaks 1.2
entry.content:
• Added a separate option for language bar supplementary icons, such as Japanese Romaji or Kana.
  • Fixed some non-language icons, such as the keyboard icon, hiding when hiding the language bar.

Both fixes were contributed by jingyu9575.

entry.title: CEF/Spotify Tweaks 0.7
entry.content:
• Add support for Spotify 1.2.57
  • Fix JS API being unavailable on Spotify 1.2.4-1.2.32: use window._getSpotifyModule('ctewh') instead on these versions
  • The transparent rendering, anti-forced dark mode, and Chrome extension enabler mods can now be applied even if the mod is loaded a bit late

entry.title: Start button always on the left 1.2.1
entry.content:
• Improved start menu positioning.
  • Fixed the start menu width option not applying until restart in some cases.

entry.title: Spoof Light/Dark Theme 1.0.0
entry.content:
Spoof Light/Dark Theme

This mod lets you make specific applications believe you are using either light or dark theme, regardless of your actual Windows setting.

entry.title: Taskbar on top for Windows 11 1.1.1
entry.content: • Added support for the new thumbnail previews implementation in Windows.

entry.title: Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11 1.3.3
entry.content:
• Added support for the new thumbnail previews implementation in Windows.
  • Improved start menu positioning.
  • Fixed crashes in recent Windows 11 builds when the taskbar overflow is used.
  • Fixed restoring jump list animation when the mod is disabled.

entry.title: Alt+Tab window delayer 1.1.0
entry.content: Add support for the Win10 alt+tab on Win11

entry.title: Alt+Tab per monitor 1.1.0
entry.content: • Make the mod compatible with Win10 and with the Win10 alt+tab on Win11

entry.title: Logon, Logoff & Shutdown Sounds Restored 1.0.3
entry.content:
• Fixed compatibility with ExplorerEx and XP/Server 2003 and earlier Explorer ports like it
  • Made code style more consistent

entry.title: Taskbar tray system icon tweaks 1.1.1
entry.content: • When hiding the language bar, supplementary icons (such as Japanese Romaji or Kana) are now hidden too.

entry.title: Windows 11 Taskbar Styler 1.3.9
entry.content:
• Added the 21996Taskbar theme.
  • Updated themes: WinXP, Lucent.
  • Empty visual states can now be targeted, can be useful in cases when there's no active visual state.
  • Fixed error 80070490 which sometime prevented the mod from loading.

entry.title: Windows 11 Start Menu Styler 1.2.1
entry.content:
• Added themes: 21996, Down Aero, UniMenu.
  • Updated themes: NoRecommendedSection, TranslucentStartMenu.
  • Added support for styling the Windows 10 search menu.
  • Added support for styling the offline variant of the search menu (when the DisableSearchBoxSuggestions registry option is enabled).
  • Fixed the All Apps list sometimes becoming truncated.
  • Empty visual states can now be targeted, can be useful in cases when there's no active visual state.
  • Fixed not being able to style some elements due to error 802B000A (failed to create a 'System.Type' from the text).

entry.title: CEF/Spotify Tweaks 0.6
entry.content:
• Add support for Spotify 1.2.55 and 1.2.56
  • Support directly enabling transparent web content rendering without having to patch Spotify.exe manually
  • Add options to disable forced dark mode or force-enable Chrome extension support
  • Add a JavaScript API for interacting with this mod or the main window that can be used within Spicetify extensions and themes

entry.title: Taskbar on top for Windows 11 1.1
entry.content:
• Added an option to show running indicators above the taskbar icons.
  • Fixed context menus not appearing with monitors that are arranged vertically, one above the other.

entry.title: Classic Start Menu Folders Icon 1.0
entry.content:
Classic Start Menu Folders Icon

Changes the default icon of Start Menu folders that was used in Windows XP and before.

NOTE: This mod doesn't change the icon of Windows 10/11 Start Menu. Open-Shell was used for the screenshot.

entry.title: Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11 1.3.2
entry.content: • Show the running indicator on the right instead of the left when the taskbar is on the right.

entry.title: Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11 1.3.1
entry.content:
• Fixed the start menu width option not applying until restart in some cases.
  • Fixed context menus not appearing with monitors that are arranged vertically, one above the other.
  • Fixed compatibility with recent preview builds of Windows 11.

entry.title: Show all apps by default in start menu 1.0.3
entry.content: • Fixed compatibility with update KB5050094 for Windows 11 version 24H2.

entry.title: Classic Taskbar 3D buttons Lite 1.3.1
entry.content: Warning on progress bar
